description:
User can pick from 2 Magnetic types:
-Red magnet (push)
-Blue magnet (pul)

User can pick which part of the magnet works
-Full circle
-Right side
-Left side
-Upper side
-Lower side

Note: user can use the Magnetic extension once for each object
name: MagneticField
shortDescription: Turn an object into a Magnetic field

eventsFunctions.description: Create a magnetic field around the selected object
eventsFunctions.name: MagneticField
eventsFunctions.sentence: Turn _PARAM1_ to _PARAM4_ with the range _PARAM6_ and power _PARAM5_

parameters.description: Which field part of the magnetic works
parameters.name: Part
parameters.supplementaryInformation: ["Full circle field (360 degree)","Right part only (90 degree)","Left part only (-90 degree)","Upper part only (180 degree)","Lower part only (-180 degree)"]
